channel.title: How to make the client run on a webpage?
channel.description:
me and my friend have been trying alot of things to get the client into our webpage. We want it to run on the webpage like runescape does, instead of a client. If someone can give me a tutorial, video, or a code that would be great... if you give me a code i need the code that i would put on the page content so that it will run like a regular client would but on a webpage.
Thnks,
Tom

item.title: How to make the client run on a webpage?
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

This should be basic nuff, just make sure the Jar Download link ends in .jar ;)

Read full topic
